description: The fire service says there is a "large amount of smoke coming from the roof".
title: People in Plymouth told to close windows and doors due to fire
title_page: People in Plymouth told to close windows and doors due to fire - BBC News
maintext:
Firefighters have said people should keep their windows and doors closed in an area of Plymouth after a fire next to a fast food takeaway on Saturday.
Devon and Somerset Fire and Rescue said eight fire engines were at the scene on Union Street.
Fire services said they were called to a premises next to KFC at about 16:30 GMT where the first and second floor of the property was alight.
A spokesperson said cylinders were involved in the fire which was "making it more difficult" to control.
